CustomField.formula:
IF(TEXT(Familiar_w_IKO_Roofing__c) == 'Yes',
IF(Contains(TEXT(SBS_IKO__c), '%'), IF(VALUE(SUBSTITUTE(TEXT(SBS_IKO__c), '%', '')) > 50, 'High', IF(VALUE(SUBSTITUTE(TEXT(SBS_IKO__c), '%', '')) <= 50, 'Low', 'Unknown' ) ), 'Unknown' ),
IF(TEXT(Familiar_w_IKO_Roofing__c) == 'Not Applicable', 'Not Applicable', 'Unknown') )
CustomField.label: Acceptance - Roofing
